attributes.action: Only award Disabled Students Allowance (DSA) to disabled students who receive Disability Living Allowance (DLA)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many students who receive Disabled Students Allowance have no history of disability and received no support in school, or have not experienced severe disabling illness or injury prior to going to university. 

Only awarding Disabled Students Allowance to those in receipt of Disability Living Allowance (so considered by a doctor to have a disability or illness) would ensure that only disabled students are given a DSA award.
